summary: An email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York inquiring about foreign travel procedures and a required form (DO1-504) for individuals with TS/SCI clearance, related to a trip planned to start on February 3, 2020.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working on travel approvals for a trip starting February 3, 2020, and inquiring about a required form for TS/SCI clearance.

events.title: Planned Foreign Trip
events.description: A trip planned to start on February 3, 2020, requiring foreign travel approvals and completion of a DO1-504 form for individuals with TS/SCI clearance.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York is planning foreign travel starting February 3, 2020.
The email inquires about a required form (DO1-504) for individuals with TS/SCI clearance for foreign travel.
The correspondence indicates ongoing official travel preparations by a federal prosecutor in early 2020.
